ps1.2:1.1: Kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni, kati diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānāni, kati diṭṭhiyo, kati diṭṭhābhinivesā, katamo diṭṭhiṭṭhānasamugghātoti?
ps1.2:8.2: Rūpaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.7: viññāṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.14: manaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.21: dhamme etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.28: manoviññāṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.35: manosamphassaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.42: manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.6: dhammasaññaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.13: dhammasañcetanaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.20: dhammataṇhaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.27: dhammavitakkaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.34: dhammavicāraṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:10.6: viññāṇadhātuṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:10.17: viññāṇakasiṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:11.32: matthaluṅgaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:13.18: manoviññāṇadhātuṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:14.19: paññindriyaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:15.24: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:16.12: jarāmaraṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:17.2: Khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, phassopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, saññāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, vitakkopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, ayoniso manasikāropi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, pāpamittopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ, paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ.
ps1.2:18.1: Khandhā hetu khandhā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:19.1: Avijjā hetu avijjā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:20.1: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:21.1: Saññā hetu saññā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:22.1: Vitakko hetu vitakko paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:23.1: Ayoniso manasikāro hetu ayoniso manasikāro paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:24.1: Pāpamitto hetu pāpamitto paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:25.1: Paratoghoso hetu paratoghoso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:26.2: Yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṁ, diṭṭhigahanaṁ, diṭṭhikantāraṁ, diṭṭhivisūkaṁ, diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ, diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ, diṭṭhisallaṁ, diṭṭhisambādho, diṭṭhipalibodho, diṭṭhibandhanaṁ, diṭṭhipapāto, diṭṭhānusayo, diṭṭhisantāpo, diṭṭhipariḷāho, diṭṭhigantho, diṭṭhupādānaṁ, diṭṭhābhiniveso, diṭṭhiparāmāso—
ps1.2:27.2: Assādadiṭṭhi, attānudiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhi, sakkāyadiṭṭhi, sakkāyavatthukā sassatadiṭṭhi, sakkāyavatthukā ucchedadiṭṭhi, antaggāhikā diṭṭhi, pubbantānudiṭṭhi, aparantānudiṭṭhi, saññojanikā diṭṭhi, ahanti mānavinibandhā diṭṭhi, mamanti mānavinibandhā diṭṭhi, attavādapaṭisaṁyuttā diṭṭhi, lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā diṭṭhi, bhavadiṭṭhi, vibhavadiṭṭhi—
ps1.2:28.12: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:28.13: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:29.5: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.7: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.10: Saññojanikāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.11: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.12: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.13: Attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.14: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:30.1: Assādadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:30.2: Yaṁ rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādoti—
ps1.2:30.4: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:30.6: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—
ps1.2:31.3: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
ps1.2:31.6: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:31.9: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo—
ps1.2:31.11: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.
ps1.2:31.12: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṁ dānaṁ na mahapphalaṁ hoti na mahānisaṁsaṁ.
ps1.2:32.3: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:32.4: yañca manokammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:32.7: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṁ vā kosātakībījaṁ vā tittakālābubījaṁ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṁ yaṁ ceva pathavirasaṁ upādiyati, yañca āporasaṁ upādiyati, sabbaṁ taṁ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṁvattati.
ps1.2:32.10: Evamevaṁ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:32.11: yañca manokammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:33.1: Micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṁ, diṭṭhigahanaṁ, diṭṭhikantāraṁ, diṭṭhivisūkaṁ, diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ, diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ, diṭṭhisallaṁ, diṭṭhisambādho, diṭṭhipalibodho, diṭṭhibandhanaṁ, diṭṭhipapāto, diṭṭhānusayo, diṭṭhisantāpo, diṭṭhipariḷāho, diṭṭhigantho, diṭṭhupādānaṁ, diṭṭhābhiniveso, diṭṭhiparāmāso—
ps1.2:34.1: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:36.2: Kāmarāgasaññojanaṁ, paṭighasaññojanaṁ, mānasaññojanaṁ, vicikicchāsaññojanaṁ, bhavarāgasaññojanaṁ, issāsaññojanaṁ, macchariyasaññojanaṁ, anunayasaññojanaṁ, avijjāsaññojanaṁ—
ps1.2:37.34: yaṁ manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ manosamphassajāya vedanāya assādoti—
ps1.2:37.36: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:37.38: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—
ps1.2:38.3: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
ps1.2:38.6: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:38.9: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo, ayaṁ vuccati diṭṭhirāgo.
ps1.2:38.10: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.
ps1.2:38.11: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṁ dānaṁ na mahapphalaṁ hoti na mahānisaṁsaṁ.
ps1.2:39.3: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:39.4: yañca manokammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:39.7: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṁ vā kosātakībījaṁ vā tittakālābubījaṁ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṁ yañceva pathavirasaṁ upādiyati yañca āporasaṁ upādiyati, sabbaṁ taṁ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṁvattati.
ps1.2:39.10: Evamevaṁ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:39.11: yañca manokammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ, yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:41.1: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:41.6: Kāmarāgasaññojanaṁ, paṭighasaññojanaṁ, mānasaññojanaṁ, vicikicchāsaññojanaṁ, bhavarāgasaññojanaṁ, issāsaññojanaṁ, macchariyasaññojanaṁ, anunayasaññojanaṁ, avijjāsaññojanaṁ—
ps1.2:41.8: Assādadiṭṭhiyā imehi pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:42.1: Attānudiṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:42.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
ps1.2:42.6: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:43.6: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:43.13: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:44.11: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;
ps1.2:44.17: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:45.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:45.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:45.22: So kho pana ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:45.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:46.14: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:46.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:47.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ rūpe”ti.
ps1.2:47.14: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:47.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ rūpe”ti.
ps1.2:47.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:48.2: Idhekacco cakkhusamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ sotasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ ghānasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ jivhāsamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:48.3: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—
ps1.2:48.5: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:48.7: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:48.8: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—
ps1.2:48.11: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:49.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:50.14: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:50.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:51.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.
ps1.2:51.14: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:51.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.
ps1.2:51.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:52.8: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti—
ps1.2:52.10: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:52.12: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ saññaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:52.13: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti.
ps1.2:52.16: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:53.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:54.14: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:54.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:55.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.
ps1.2:55.14: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:55.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.
ps1.2:55.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:56.2: Idhekacco cakkhusamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ sotasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ ghānasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ jivhāsamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ manosamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:56.6: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:56.8: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:56.9: “Yā manosamphassajā cetanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā cetanā”ti—
ps1.2:56.12: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:57.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imehi saṅkhārehi saṅkhāravā”ti.
ps1.2:57.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:57.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā.
ps1.2:57.26: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:58.14: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:58.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:59.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imesu saṅkhāresū”ti.
ps1.2:59.14: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:59.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imesu saṅkhāresū”ti.
ps1.2:59.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:60.10: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:60.17: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:61.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā viññāṇena viññāṇavā”ti.
ps1.2:61.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:61.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā viññāṇena viññāṇavā”ti.
ps1.2:61.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:62.14: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:62.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:63.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ viññāṇe”ti.
ps1.2:63.14: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:63.22: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ viññāṇe”ti.
ps1.2:63.25: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:63.32: Attānudiṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:64.4: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:64.18: “natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā, ye imañca lokaṁ, parañca lokaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī”ti—vatthu.
ps1.2:64.20: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:65.1: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:65.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:65.6: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:66.14: sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:67.1: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:67.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:67.6: viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:68.8: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:68.14: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:68.21: sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā imehi pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:69.1: Sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:69.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, saññaṁ attato samanupassati, saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:70.12: sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:71.1: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:71.16: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti …
ps1.2:71.17: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:72.3: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:73.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:73.7: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:76.11: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:77.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:77.7: Yaṁ pharati, taṁ vatthu ceva loko ca.
ps1.2:77.8: Yena pharati, so attā ceva loko cāti—
ps1.2:77.12: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:78.8: Yaṁ pharati taṁ vatthu ceva loko ca.
ps1.2:78.9: Yena pharati so attā ceva loko cāti—
ps1.2:78.14: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:79.7: Yaṁ pharati taṁ vatthu ceva loko ca;
ps1.2:79.8: yena pharati so attā ceva loko cāti—
ps1.2:79.12: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:80.9: yena pharati so attā ceva loko cāti—
ps1.2:80.14: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:81.8: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:82.5: yaṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīraṁ, yaṁ sarīraṁ taṁ jīvanti—
ps1.2:82.10: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:83.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:83.9: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:84.11: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:85.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:85.4: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hotipi tiṭṭhatipi uppajjatipi nibbattatipīti—
ps1.2:85.8: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:86.5: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hotipi tiṭṭhatipi uppajjatipi nibbattatipīti—
ps1.2:86.10: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:87.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:87.9: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:87.12: ayaṁ paṭhamā “na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:88.11: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:89.1: **“Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”**ti—
ps1.2:89.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:89.4: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hoti ca na ca hotīti—
ps1.2:89.8: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:89.11: ayaṁ paṭhamā “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:90.5: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hoti ca na ca hotīti—
ps1.2:90.9: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:90.10: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:91.1: **“Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”**ti—
ps1.2:91.2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:91.4: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā neva hoti na na hotīti—
ps1.2:91.8: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi, aññā diṭṭhi, aññaṁ vatthu.
ps1.2:91.10: ayaṁ paṭhamā “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.5: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā neva hoti na na hotīti—
ps1.2:92.9: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:92.12: ayaṁ pañcamī “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.16: “Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.17: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:92.18: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:93.1: Pubbantānudiṭṭhiyā katamehi aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:93.2: Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatikā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā—
ps1.2:93.3: pubbantānudiṭṭhiyā imehi aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:94.1: Aparantānudiṭṭhiyā katamehi catucattālīsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:94.2: Soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā—
ps1.2:94.3: aparantānudiṭṭhiyā imehi catucattālīsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:100.2: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:100.6: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ …pe….
ps1.2:101.7: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;
ps1.2:101.15: attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:102.1: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:102.4: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:103.2: sassato ca asassato ca attā ca loko cāti …pe…
ps1.2:103.3: neva sassato nāsassato attā ca loko cāti …
ps1.2:103.6: antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca loko cāti …
ps1.2:103.7: neva antavā na anantavā attā ca loko cāti abhinivesaparāmāso lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:103.8: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:104.3: Assādadiṭṭhiyā pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo, kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:104.4: Attānudiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo …pe…
ps1.2:104.5: lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:105.1: Assādadiṭṭhiyā pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.2: Attānudiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo, pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.3: Micchādiṭṭhiyā dasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.4: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo, pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.5: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā bhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.6: Sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:107.1: Pubbantānudiṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:107.5: mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:110.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhitā devamanussā olīyanti eke, atidhāvanti eke;
ps1.2:110.5: Tesaṁ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
ps1.2:111.2: Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṁ abhinandanti—
ps1.2:111.3: yato kira, bho, ayaṁ attā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti paraṁ maraṇā, etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ etaṁ yāthāvanti.
ps1.2:112.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhūtaṁ bhūtato passati.
ps1.2:112.3: Bhūtaṁ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
ps1.2:112.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto ca passanti.
ps1.2:115.1: Tayo puggalā vipannadiṭṭhī, tayo puggalā sampannadiṭṭhī.
ps1.2:115.3: Titthiyo ca, titthiyasāvako ca, yo ca micchādiṭṭhiko—
ps1.2:116.2: Tathāgato ca, tathāgatasāvako ca, yo ca sammādiṭṭhiko—
ps1.2:121.2: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:121.4: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:121.6: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:123.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṁ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.
ps1.2:123.2: Tesaṁ diṭṭhisampannānaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:123.4: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—
ps1.2:124.2: Antarāparinibbāyissa, upahaccaparinibbāyissa, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, uddhaṁsotassa, akaniṭṭhagāmino—
ps1.2:125.1: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṁ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.
ps1.2:125.2: Tesaṁ diṭṭhisampannānaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:126.1: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.
ps1.2:126.2: Tesaṁ sotāpannānaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:126.4: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—
ps1.2:127.2: Antarāparinibbāyissa, upahaccaparinibbāyissa, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, uddhaṁsotassa, akaniṭṭhagāmino—
ps1.2:128.1: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.
ps1.2:128.2: Tesaṁ sotāpannānaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā.
